pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespear's plays.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司計劃播放莎士比亞的全部戲劇。

sentences.english: BBC reporter saw a column of smoke rising from the area.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司記者看到，從該地區煙柱上升。

sentences.english: The BBC denies that its broadcasting has been dumbed down.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司否認爲了使廣播通俗易懂而降低水準。

sentences.english: I won the BBC Young Sports Personality as well.
sentences.chinese: 我還獲得了英國廣播公司年度青年體育人物獎。

sentences.english: McEwan's play was banned by the BBC.
sentences.chinese: 麥克尤恩的劇本遭英國廣播公司禁播。

sentences.english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespeare's plays.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司計畫播放莎士比亞的全部戲劇。

sentences.english: Would you like to see an old newsreel from the BBC archives?
sentences.chinese: 你想看英國廣播公司檔案資料的一部舊新聞紀錄片嗎？

sentences.english: The BBC Symphony Orchestra played with great panache .
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司交響樂團演奏起來揮灑自如。

sentences.english: He told the BBC that he wanted 17 hours of non-stop TV time….
sentences.chinese: 他要求英國廣播公司提供17個小時的連續電視節目。

sentences.english: On the B. B. C. you can hear the clock when it is actually striking.
sentences.chinese: 當大鐘打點時，你可以從英國廣播公司的廣播中聽到。

sentences.english: The B. B. C. are not often late (in) broadcasting the news.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司通常能及時播報新聞。

sentences.english: BBC plans to televise all Shakespeare's plays.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司對全世界進行廣播。
她是英國廣播公司的播音員。

definition: The Sun (the name of various newspapers, notably in the UK and in Hong Kong)
Nikkei Shimbun, Japanese equivalent of Financial Times

definition: Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009
Associated Press (AP)/abbr. for 美國聯合通訊社|美国联合通讯社[Mei3 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4]
Mainichi Shimbun, a Japanese daily newspaper
